house_listing.house_description: Currently a duplex, but ready for conversion to a single family home! After conversion, this home will be a four bedroom, three bath home with a wonderfully large living and dining areas! The original construction allowed for the removal of a wall seperating the living areas. The smaller kitchen can be converted into a utility room...the conversion will be a deed restriction, but there is flexibility on the timing. Both sides are rented.., so an appointment is necessary to show it. The floor plan is available.

highlights.item: Walking distance to three Lockhart schools
